title: FlatWorld
text: CANCELLED!![FlatWorld] is a modern publishing platform that allows our professors to get up-to-date content into the market rapidly.  Each textbook is then easily customizable and comes equipped with a full range of instructor supplements and a homework system at no additional charge.  We've designed our website, books, and interfaces to be easy to use - no training or tutorials are needed.  We focus on the additions that drive value because we believe that being efficient and affordable makes your life easier and your students more successful.
